00008 class ORAD413ADCDecoder : public ORVBasicADCDecoder
00009 {
00010   public:
00011     ORAD413ADCDecoder() {}
00012     virtual ~ORAD413ADCDecoder() {}
00013 
00014     virtual inline UInt_t ChannelOf(UInt_t* record)
00015       { if (IsLong(record)) record += 1; return (record[0] & 0x00006000) >> 13; }
00016     virtual inline UInt_t ADCValueOf(UInt_t* record)
00017       { if (IsLong(record)) record += 1; return (record[0] & 0x00001fff); }
00018 
00019     virtual inline size_t GetNbinsX() { return 0x1fff+1; }
00020     virtual inline double GetXHi() { return double(0x1fff) + 0.5; }
00021 
00022     virtual inline size_t GetNChannelsMax() { return 0x6+1; }
00023     virtual inline std::string GetLabel() { return "AD413"; }
00024     virtual inline std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORAD413AModel:ADC"; }
